title: Joan Smalls shows off her supermodel physique in a tiny yellow bikini
text:
She is one of the most successful models in the world, having worked in dozens of countries.

And Joan Smalls showed that she doesn't need a runway to show off her incredible physique as she posed for a few snaps on Thursday.

The Puerto Rican supermodel, 31, looked sensational in a tiny yellow and white bikini with drawstring ties on the bottoms.

Gorgeous: Joan Smalls, 31, showed off her toned figure and supermodel legs as she posed up a storm in a yellow and white bikini on Thursday

Joan wore her sleek brunette locks in a high ponytail and let them cascade over her shoulders for the photoshoot in her back garden.

The model accessorised her bikini by adding a few delicate bracelets as well as an anklet and pearl earrings.

She exuded confidence as she lifted one leg and tilted her head to one side while playing with a strand of hair, working all her best angles.

Poser: She exuded confidence as she lifted one leg and tilted her head to one side while playing with a strand of hair, working all her best angles

Joan also shared a sizzling selfie with the sun peaking out from behind her shoulder and appeared to have added a touch of makeup to accentuate her pretty features.

She captioned her Instagram post: 'There’s no place like Home. Jibarita de corazón!'

The sun-soaked display comes after Joan appeared at a Nordstrom Store Opening in New York City on Tuesday night.

Glam: Joan also shared a sizzling selfie with the sun peaking out from behind her shoulder and appeared to have added a touch of makeup to accentuate her pretty features

Earlier in October Joan also turned heads while attending the Mile-Long Runway event at New York's Highline Stages to promote Sorel footwear.

The stunner grabbed all the attention as she donned a snow white drawstring hoodie and a pair of tiny brown shorts which showed off her toned, long limbs.

Joan, who has been in a long-term relationship with Modellounge founder Bernard Smith since 2011, has carved out an impressive career for herself since entering the modelling industry in 2007.

She has lent her good looks to high-profile brands such as Chloe, Givenchy, Fendi, Dior, Balmain and more.

Smiles: Joan commanded attention in a tiny pair of shorts and chunky boots when she attended the SOREL Mile-Long Runway event on October 2

Joan also bagged the coveted Victoria's Secret gig in 2010, and walked in all of their following runway shows until 2016.

Smalls has become known for her statuesque physique, strutting the runway multiple times as a Victoria's Secret Angel.

She told Vogue: 'I work out almost every day and I mix it up: I do Thai kickboxing, I have a personal trainer, I work out at my gym.

'I actually like working out. It’s such a stress reliever when you’re just focusing on yourself and not thinking about anything else except the music and your body.'

Stunning: Joan, pictured at the start of October, has worked with high-profile brands such as Chloe, Givenchy, Fendi, Dior, Balmain and more

The 5 ft 10 in catwalk queen was also asked by Emirates Women, if there was anything she wanted to change about the modelling industry.

Joan admitted: 'To have a social responsibility when deciding the message they put out to their consumers and not just do it because they are riding the wave of trends.

'Also to have transparency in jobs/ contracts – it has become much more than just showing up. There are so many variables that I think agencies should be more direct and honest in some instances.'
